msbt.message: So, do you know about Reactions?I mean like, when you feel full of Joy and your body just starts moving on its own. Like I'm doing now!OK, that was kinda weird. But that's Reactions for you! They're all about getting emotions across. Wanna try Reactions for yourself? Just hit î‚§. Do enough and BAM! There's your stretches for the day!I'm gonna tell everyone to show you their favorite Reactions too, so be sure to ask around, !

Hey, you like Reactions, right?Watch this<10_10 />HIYAAACHOOO!<10_9 />Heh heh That was quite a sneeze! Hope I didn't scare anyone.Some think sneezing is contagious, but that's not true, right? Why are you making that face, ? HIIYAA<10_10 />CHOOOOO!<10_9 /> Whew! There's nothing like a good sneeze. See for yourself with the Sneezing Reaction!

You hear that? There's some kind of scary, rustling sound coming from behind you! Huh? That was just some paper stuck to you? Heh. Wow. I, uhguess my Reactions are on overdrive.I just wanted to teach you how to show everyone Distress.<10_4 /> Quit staring! I'm serious!
Hey! You want more Reactions? You got it!Check this out WAAAAAAAAAA!Use that if you ever see me get beat at arm wrestling, 'cause OF COURSE you'd be Shocked if that happened!
GIVE IT ALL YOU GOT!<10_9 />You want Reactions to cheer folks on? You got it!I love this one 'cause Encouraging your buddies is AWESOME! WatchFLEX THOSE MUSCLES!

When you think of a superhero, you think of a hero pose, right? Like how each one's got their own Flourish.I thought up the best hero pose ever and I'm gonna teach it to you. Just wait till you see the Reactions!, ready for action!Next time needs a hero, break that out and save the day, .
